hero.title: Build Your
hero.description: Complete solution integrating Next.js, Clerk, Polar, and Supabase. Focus on your core business logic, not infrastructure.

features.title: Why Choose Our Starter Kit?
features.subtitle: Integrating industry best practices and top-tier services to get your SaaS product online quickly

cta.title: Ready to Start Building Your SaaS?
cta.subtitle: All features are pre-configured, so you can focus on your core business logic

auth.title: Complete Authentication
auth.description: Use Clerk for secure user authentication, social logins, multi-factor authentication, and organization management.

payment.title: Payment Subscription Management
payment.description: Integrate Polar for subscription billing, invoice generation, refund processing, and revenue analytics.

database.title: Powerful Database
database.description: Use Supabase for PostgreSQL database, real-time sync, file storage, and Row Level Security.

development.title: Rapid Development
development.description: Built on Next.js 15 and TypeScript, providing modern development experience and optimal performance.

pricing.title: Choose the Right Plan for You
pricing.subtitle: From personal projects to enterprise applications, we offer flexible pricing plans

free.name: Basic User
free.description: Perfect for personal use and small projects

pro.name: Professional User
pro.description: Perfect for growing teams and businesses

pricing.bottomInfo: Free plan requires no credit card, paid plans can be upgraded or downgraded anytime

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from developers and businesses worldwide

items.name: John Smith
items.content: This Starter Kit got our SaaS product online in just two weeks. Authentication, payments, and database are perfectly integrated, saving us months of development time.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: The code quality is excellent, documentation is detailed, and support is great. Our team was able to quickly get up to speed and customize features to meet our needs.

items.name: David Wilson
items.content: From concept to product launch took only one month. This template includes all the features we needed, allowing us to focus on core business logic.

footer.description: Complete solution for building modern SaaS applications quickly. Integrating Next.js, Clerk, Polar, and Supabase, so you can focus on your core business logic.
footer.copyright: © 2025 SaaS Starter Kit. All rights reserved.

subscription.notFoundDesc: Please refresh the page or contact customer support
subscription.paymentSuccess: Payment successful! Your subscription has been upgraded, please wait a moment for the system to sync data.
subscription.paymentCanceled: Payment canceled, you can retry upgrading anytime.
subscription.cancelWarning: After cancellation, you will lose professional features at the end of the current billing cycle.
subscription.basicUserNoPayment: You are currently a basic user, no payment management required
subscription.canResubscribe: You can resubscribe to any plan
subscription.confirmUpgrade: Are you sure you want to upgrade to Professional?\n\nAfter upgrading, you will enjoy more features and higher usage quotas.
subscription.confirmCancelSub: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? This action will take effect at the end of the current billing cycle.
subscription.confirmResume: Are you sure you want to resume automatic renewal? Your subscription will be charged normally.

alerts.paymentSuccess: Payment successful! Your subscription has been upgraded, please wait a moment for the system to sync data.
alerts.paymentCanceled: Payment canceled, you can retry upgrading anytime.
alerts.subscriptionCancelSuccess: Subscription successfully scheduled for cancellation, will take effect at the end of the current billing cycle.
alerts.subscriptionResumeSuccess: Subscription successfully resumed, will renew normally.

alerts.portalError: Unable to open customer portal, please try again later

status.willExpireWarning: Your subscription will expire on {date}. To continue using professional features, please re-enable automatic renewal.
status.autoRenewActive: Your professional subscription will auto-renew, no action required.

ui.billingNoticeDesc: Plan changes will take effect in the next billing cycle. If you upgrade, you will be charged proportionally immediately. If you downgrade, the change will take effect at the end of the current billing cycle.
